mods.abstract: Minutes and reports from general assemblies of the United Student Christian Council (USCC). The USCC, a member of the World Student Christian Federation, unites student Christian organizations in the United States to build Christian community on campuses and support the member organizations' shared goals. General assemblies are the main legislative body of the organization allowing members to participate in discussion and decision making at a national level and hear reports and presentations.
mods.note: [Identification of the item you are citing], YWCA of the U.S.A. records, MS 324, Smith College Special Collections, [microform number], [microdex number]
